text: Skvernyye zhenshchiny - dlya skvernykh muzhchin, a skvernyye muzhchiny - dlya skvernykh zhenshchin, i khoroshiye zhenshchiny - dlya khoroshikh muzhchin, a khoroshiye muzhchiny - dlya khoroshikh zhenshchin. Oni neprichastny k tomu, chto govoryat klevetniki. Im ugotovano proshcheniye i shchedryy udel
